bill.title: Responsible Path to Full Obamacare Repeal Act
bill.description: Repeals the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act and the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010, effective at the beginning of FY2020. Provisions of law amended by those Acts are restored.

committee.name: Subcommittee for Indigenous Peoples of the United States
